title: frontend web application
extract: The backend of a web application is an enabler for a frontend experience. ... Backend code is run on the server, as opposed to the client. This means that backend developers not only need to understand programming languages and databases, but they must have an understanding of server architecture as well.
extract_html: The backend of a web application is an enabler for a frontend experience. ... Backend code is run on the server, as opposed to the client. This means that backend developers not only need to understand programming languages and databases, but they must have an understanding of server architecture as well.
